title: Latest Nintendo Switch Model Rumors - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.18.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 15% off your first purchase at http://thirdlove.com/games

Fran and Andrea discuss the latest Nintendo rumors, Troy Baker, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:29 - Housekeeping
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, James Davis, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:40 - More Nintendo Switch Pro and Mini Chatter Via Chris Kohler
00:15:21 - eShop Troubles Caused on Heels of Joker’s Smash Launch Via Adam Bankhurst (IGN)
00:19:04 -  Epic Announces $100M Fortnite Creative Cup by Jessie Wade (IGN)
00:22:44 -  Troy Baker vs Borderlands 3: Actor Suggests CEO Needs to Fact-Check By Adam Bankhurst (IGN
00:26:22 - Division 2 Raid Delayed Via (PC Gamer)
00:32:15 - Sega confirms 10 more games for Genesis Mini, including Castle of Illusion and Earthworm Jim By Michael McWhertor (Polygon)
00:37:30 - Out today
00:39:48 -  Robinhood
00:41:12 - Thirdlove
Reader mail   -
00:44:28 - There was a lot of talk on the $250 price yesterday and how a $50 price difference isn’t huge. By chance could the retailers be apart of this? Microsoft has to get them to stock the console. Which requires contracts. For SAD Editon they sell, they lose game sales. Why would a retailer sell a $150 Xbox when they can sell the disc drive version to get physical game sales, aka more money in the end - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:52:50 - How confident are you that streaming AAA games will work? - Wyatt
00:57:55 - Squad Up: Farmer Josh(PS4) - Dumbace15
01:00:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Tim
